The Moon and other celestial bodies would no longer be held in orbit, causing them to float freely in space.
The oceans would no longer be able to hold their current shape, and they would begin to spread out into space.
Plants and animals would no longer be able to maintain their balance, and they would likely collapse or become extinct.
Humans would no longer be able to walk or stand, and they would need to adapt to a weightless environment.
The Earth's atmosphere would no longer be able to maintain its current pressure, and it would collapse, causing the Earth to lose its atmosphere and become uninhabitable.
